description: Minimal degree path length of a tree with n leaves.
references: Theorem 5.4.9L in D. E. Knuth, `The Art of Computer Programming', Volume 3.
links: Index entries for sequences related to trees
mathematica: a[n_] := For[q = 0, True, q++, If[2*3^(q-1) <= n <= 3^q, Return[3*q*n + 2*(n-3^q)], If[3^q <= n <= 2*3^q, Return[3*q*n + 4*(n-3^q)]]]]; Array[a, 55] (* _Jean-FranÃ§ois Alcover_, Oct 26 2015 *)
author: _Don Knuth_
